title: Can rito make the club limit higher
body: because for about half the year my club has been at max limit and where wondering if the limit can go higher

replies.body:
The club limit should be expanded to 100 (or more if needed) right after new client is finished!

More info [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/reformed-players-ask-riot-how-you-me-now).
